jobData.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobData.description: We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in full-stack development, strong expertise in React and Node.js, and experience with cloud technologies. You will be responsible for leading development projects, mentoring junior developers, and driving technical excellence. Our stack includes React, TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Docker, and AWS. We offer competitive salary, remote work options, and opportunities for professional growth.

userProfile.experience:
Senior Software Engineer at Tech Corp (2020-Present)

• Led a team of 5 developers in building scalable web applications
• Architected and implemented microservices using Node.js and Docker
• Reduced deployment time by 60% through CI/CD optimization
• Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews
• Implemented automated testing reducing bugs by 45%

Software Developer at StartupXYZ (2018-2020)

• Built RESTful APIs using Express.js and MongoDB
• Developed responsive frontends with React and TypeScript
• Collaborated in Agile teams to deliver projects on time
userProfile.preferences: Remote work, leadership opportunities, innovative projects

cvText:
John Doe
john.doe@email.com
+27 72 123 456 789
Johannesburg, South Africa

SUMMARY
Senior Software Engineer with 7 years of experience in full-stack development, team leadership, and cloud architecture. Passionate about building scalable solutions and mentoring developers.

EXPERIENCE
Tech Corp
Senior Software Engineer
2020 - Present
• Led a team of 5 developers in building scalable web applications
• Architected and implemented microservices using Node.js and Docker
• Reduced deployment time by 60% through CI/CD optimization
• Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews
• Implemented automated testing reducing bugs by 45%

StartupXYZ
Software Developer
2018 - 2020
• Built RESTful APIs using Express.js and MongoDB
• Developed responsive frontends with React and TypeScript
• Collaborated in Agile teams to deliver projects on time

EDUCATION
University of Johannesburg
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
2014 - 2018
Specialized in Software Engineering and Distributed Systems

SKILLS
Technical Skills: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, Git, CI/CD, REST API, GraphQL, Microservices
Soft Skills: Team Leadership, Problem Solving, Communication, Agile Methodology, Mentoring, Project Management
